verbose_text: All attempts to enhance the ratio by changing the solvent (THF, toluene, DME), the amount of BrCH 2 Li (1, 1.5, 2 equivalents), reaction temperature (-65 or -78 degreesC), running-time (0.5, 1, 2 h), or work-up in acidic medium (quenching by saturated ammonium chloride solution or equivalent acetic acid) failed (Scheme XREF_FIG).
